languages.text: "Неужто змеиный яд сочится из твоих уст? Мы, {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дети Азуриана{/g}, знакомы с искусством ведения войны. Мы не налетчики, не палачи и прежде всего — не глупцы! Когда {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мир-корабль{/g} терзает бедствие, его обитатели не станут начинать войну против всех {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} сектора. Если ты ищешь врагов — ищи в ином месте".

traits.locale_text: "Неужто змеиный яд сочится из твоих уст? Мы, {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дети Азуриана{/g}, знакомы с искусством ведения войны. Мы не налетчики, не палачи и прежде всего — не глупцы! Когда {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мир-корабль{/g} терзает бедствие, его обитатели не станут начинать войну против всех {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} сектора. Если ты ищешь врагов — ищи в ином месте".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Is that snake venom seeping from your lips? We, the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}, are no strangers to the art of war. We are not raiders, or butchers, or, least of all, fools! When a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is beset by calamity, its inhabitants do not start a war with every {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} in the sector. If you are looking for enemies, look for them elsewhere."
languages.original_text: "Неужто змеиный яд сочится из твоих уст? Мы, {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дети Азуриана{/g}, знакомы с искусством ведения войны. Мы не налетчики, не палачи и прежде всего — не глупцы! Когда {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}мир-корабль{/g} терзает бедствие, его обитатели не станут начинать войну против всех {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} сектора. Если ты ищешь врагов — ищи в ином месте".

When a Craftworld suffers distress, its inhabitants do not start a war with every mon-keigh in the sector. If you are looking for enemies, look for them elsewhere."

We are not raiders, or butchers, or, least of all, fools! When a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is beset by calamity, its inhabitants do not start a war with every {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} in the sector. If you are looking for enemies, look for them elsewhere."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你的嘴里吐出来的是毒蛇的毒液吗？我们是{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}，尽管我们对战争的艺术并不陌生，但我们不是掠夺者，也不是屠夫，更不是蠢货！当{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}处于灾难中时，它的居民根本不会跑到星区里，与遇到的每个{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}开战。如果你打算寻找敌人，去别的地方找吧。”
languages.original_text: "Is that snake venom seeping from your lips? We, the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}, are no strangers to the art of war. We are not raiders, or butchers, or, least of all, fools! When a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is beset by calamity, its inhabitants do not start a war with every {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} in the sector. If you are looking for enemies, look for them elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: “你的嘴里吐出来的是毒蛇的毒液吗？我们是{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}，尽管我们对战争的艺术并不陌生，但我们不是掠夺者，也不是屠夫，更不是蠢货！当{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}处于灾难中时，它的居民根本不会跑到星区里，与遇到的每个{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}开战。如果你打算寻找敌人，去别的地方找吧。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Is that snake venom seeping from your lips? We, the Children of Asuryan, are no strangers to the art of war. We are not raiders, or butchers, or, least of all, fools! When a craftworld is beset by calamity, its inhabitants do not start a war with every mon-keigh in the sector. If you are looking for enemies, look for them elsewhere."

languages.text: «¿Es veneno de serpiente lo que fluye de tus labios? Los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g} no somos ajenos al arte de la guerra. ¡No somos saqueadores, carniceros ni, mucho menos, necios! Cuando un {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundo astronave{/g} sufre una calamidad, sus habitantes no se lanzan a la guerra contra todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} del sector. Si buscas enemigos, hazlo en otra parte».
languages.original_text: "Is that snake venom seeping from your lips? We, the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}, are no strangers to the art of war. We are not raiders, or butchers, or, least of all, fools! When a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is beset by calamity, its inhabitants do not start a war with every {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} in the sector. If you are looking for enemies, look for them elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: «¿Es veneno de serpiente lo que fluye de tus labios? Los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g} no somos ajenos al arte de la guerra. ¡No somos saqueadores, carniceros ni, mucho menos, necios! Cuando un {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundo astronave{/g} sufre una calamidad, sus habitantes no se lanzan a la guerra contra todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} del sector. Si buscas enemigos, hazlo en otra parte».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「その唇から染み出ているのは蛇の毒か？我ら{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}は、戦争のすべを知らぬわけではない。我らは略奪者でもなければ、虐殺者でもない！{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}が災難に見舞われたとて、その住民が宙域中の{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}と戦争を始めることはない。敵を探しているのなら、他の場所を探すがいい」
languages.original_text: "Is that snake venom seeping from your lips? We, the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}, are no strangers to the art of war. We are not raiders, or butchers, or, least of all, fools! When a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is beset by calamity, its inhabitants do not start a war with every {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} in the sector. If you are looking for enemies, look for them elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: 「その唇から染み出ているのは蛇の毒か？我ら{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}は、戦争のすべを知らぬわけではない。我らは略奪者でもなければ、虐殺者でもない！{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}が災難に見舞われたとて、その住民が宙域中の{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}と戦争を始めることはない。敵を探しているのなら、他の場所を探すがいい」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ist das Schlangengift, was da von Euren Lippen tropft? Wir, die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g}, sind mit der Kunst des Krieges wohlvertraut. Wir sind keine Plünderer, keine Schlächter und gewiss keine Narren! Wenn eine Katastrophe über ein {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiff{/g} hereinbricht, beginnen dessen Bewohner nicht gleich mit jedem {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} im Sektor einen Krieg. Wenn Ihr Feinde sucht, sucht sie anderswo."
languages.original_text: "Is that snake venom seeping from your lips? We, the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}, are no strangers to the art of war. We are not raiders, or butchers, or, least of all, fools! When a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is beset by calamity, its inhabitants do not start a war with every {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} in the sector. If you are looking for enemies, look for them elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: "Ist das Schlangengift, was da von Euren Lippen tropft? Wir, die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g}, sind mit der Kunst des Krieges wohlvertraut. Wir sind keine Plünderer, keine Schlächter und gewiss keine Narren! Wenn eine Katastrophe über ein {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiff{/g} hereinbricht, beginnen dessen Bewohner nicht gleich mit jedem {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} im Sektor einen Krieg. Wenn Ihr Feinde sucht, sucht sie anderswo."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Est-ce du venin qui s'écoule de vos lèvres ? Les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} ne manquent pas d'expérience dans l'art de la guerre. Nous ne sommes ni des pillards ni des massacreurs, et encore moins des imbéciles ! Quand la calamité frappe un {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseau-monde{/g}, ses habitants ne s'amusent pas à déclarer la guerre à tous les {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} du secteur. Si vous cherchez des ennemis, ce n'est pas là que vous les trouverez. »
languages.original_text: "Is that snake venom seeping from your lips? We, the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}, are no strangers to the art of war. We are not raiders, or butchers, or, least of all, fools! When a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is beset by calamity, its inhabitants do not start a war with every {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} in the sector. If you are looking for enemies, look for them elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce du venin qui s'écoule de vos lèvres ? Les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} ne manquent pas d'expérience dans l'art de la guerre. Nous ne sommes ni des pillards ni des massacreurs, et encore moins des imbéciles ! Quand la calamité frappe un {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseau-monde{/g}, ses habitants ne s'amusent pas à déclarer la guerre à tous les {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} du secteur. Si vous cherchez des ennemis, ce n'est pas là que vous les trouverez. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yılan oldun da dudaklarından zehir mi akıyor? Biz {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g}, savaş sanatının yabancıları değiliz. Baskıncı da değiliz kasap da. Hele ahmak hiç değiliz! Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}gemidünyanın{/g} dört yanını musibetler sardıysa sakinleri, bölgedeki tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keighlere{/g} savaş ilan etmez. Niyetin kendine düşman edinmekse başka yerde ara."
languages.original_text: "Is that snake venom seeping from your lips? We, the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}, are no strangers to the art of war. We are not raiders, or butchers, or, least of all, fools! When a {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} is beset by calamity, its inhabitants do not start a war with every {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} in the sector. If you are looking for enemies, look for them elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: "Yılan oldun da dudaklarından zehir mi akıyor? Biz {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g}, savaş sanatının yabancıları değiliz. Baskıncı da değiliz kasap da. Hele ahmak hiç değiliz! Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}gemidünya{/g}nın musibetler dört yanını sardıysa sakinleri bölgedeki tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}lere savaş ilan etmezler. Niyetin kendine düşman edinmekse onu başka yerde ara."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
